ygData.subject: Re: General new observations from a level 13 wiz
ygData.msgSnippet: From 12th to 15th level, the wizards DD spell is not enough to really draw the mob to you. Thus at those levels you can do an initial blast then wait. At 16th
ygData.messageBody:
From 12th to 15th level, the wizards DD spell is not enough to really
draw the mob to you. Thus at those levels you can do an initial blast
then wait. At 16th level our damage is enough to draw any mob right on
us when we blast. Thus, after 16th it is best to wait until the tanks do
some damage first.

Croesus Illuminatus (Xegony)

Neil Lambert wrote:
>
> From: "Neil Lambert" <smartass@...>
>
> 5 seconds isn't enough... wait until your tanks do almost as much if not
> more dmg as the spell you just cast... then cast again.. i can usually cast,
> meditate half the mana just used, then cast again and i'm still very useful
> to my party and i'm 17th level
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jay Hollums <jhollums@...>
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Date: Saturday, June 12, 1999 7:05 AM
> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] General new observations from a level 13 wiz
>
> >From: "Jay Hollums" <jhollums@...>
> >
> >>
> >> You won't see any major difference in dmg until lvl 29+... then we begin
> >to
> >> shine. And another thing, you DO NOT use your most power spell as soon
> as
> >> you reach that lvl for it. Sit back and throw your previous most
> powerful
> >> spell at the baddies and they won't come at you.
> >>
> >
> >I am not using my most powerful spell as soon as I got It I'm level 13
> >now... next? Oh and I know all the tricks to wait and such... but you
> also
> >want to help as much as you can... I have found there is a find line...
> cast
> >once to start off... then again after about 3 seconds... then wait for
> about
> >5 seconds... if the battle is still a long way from finishing usually my
> >tanks are not doing so well so I have to go heavy and dump into the mob, if
> >they are doing well I watch to try to finish... I also know about rooting
> >if the Mob runs... believe me I know most of the tricks... chuckle. So
> >even though our only benefit is that we are damage doers we have to wait
> >till 29th?
> >
> >Rutreeii
> >Cazic-Thul
